title: Chronicles of a Clocksmith
description: One day, a bored little boy finds himself inside an old clock store. And while the boy is generally uninterested in most of the old and dusty clocks within the store, one particular clock strikes up his curiosity. And then everything changes for this bored little boy.Transported into a wonderful world of mystery and magic - this average little boy soon learns why he just might not be so average after all.
author: M. Doerner-Miller
